original_title: PADI - Advanced Open Water Diver Video
overview: Scuba diving is not 'one' adventure, but it is 'many' adventures and that's what PADI Advanced Open Water Diver course is about: extending your underwater horizon, collect more experiences, improve your diving skills and make you become a more competent scuba diver with more self-confidence, while you get about some of the most popular activities of scuba diving.
title: PADI - Advanced Open Water Diver Video
